heading: Today
text: Early showers east tapering off.  Morning clouds giving way to increasing sunshine.  More clouds later in the day, with a stray shower.  Highs in the 70s north to around 80 south.  Winds increasing from the south to southwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy this evening, with more clouds through NY into northern VT and Quebec after midnight, with a chance of showers late.  Lows in the 50s to near 60.  South to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph this evening, diminishing to less than 10 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Clouds thickening, with showers developing from NY into northern VT during the morning, spreading east midday and afternoon, possibly some strong thunderstorms southern VT and all of NH.  Highs in the 60s to low 70s north, 70s to low 80s south.  South to southwest winds up to 10 mph, becoming northwest late.
